835460.name: RPG Maker VX Ace - Tyler Warren RPG Battlers - 5th 50
835460.description:
Tyler Warren is back again with something you haven’t seen before. These 50 monster silhouettes are perfect for adding some horror/mystery and depth to your next project. These images are multifunctional and can be used as battlers, logos, or incorporated into other ambience within your game world. Specifically designed with form and shape in mind, these monsters have character all their own.

FEATURES:

  • 50 unique silhouettes for use at battlers, logos, or ambience.
  • Files formatted for easy Plug and Play into RPG Maker VX Ace
  • All 50 silhouettes are presented in a range of sizes from large to tiny.
  • Battlers also come in recommended sizes (proportional to each other) formatted for VX Ace .
  • Use these with Tyler’s other 200+ battlers to add a variety of exciting character to your next RPG Maker Project!
835460.supported_languages: 英语, 法语, 德语, 西班牙语 - 西班牙, 意大利语, 葡萄牙语 - 巴西, 日语
